items.name: 👕 T-shirt
items.phrase: I want to take your sweatshirt, but don't worry, I'll leave you with despair.

items.name: 🗿 Tribe figurine
items.phrase: This tribe figurine looks nice. Reminds me of your social life - non-existent.

items.name: 🧥 t-shirt 'School 21' 2.0
items.phrase: Hey, nice t-shirt! Too bad it won't help you in coding.

items.name: ☕ Thermomug
items.phrase: Thermomug Spacecats? You really are clinging to sanity, aren't you?

items.name: 📦 Stickerpack
items.phrase: Stickerpack by School 21? That’s cute. It’s like a participation award for suffering.

items.name: 🧴 Head & Shoulders
items.phrase: You're ready to face anything with Head & Shoulders. Confidence level: maximum!

items.name: 🌡️ Coffee thermos
items.phrase: A thermos of coffee? The fuel of champions and coding nights.
